response.original_title: As aventuras de uma família da colônia
response.overview: Aunt Nena, Fritz, Cleitinho and Neni are members of a typical family from Serra Gaúcha: a mixture of descendants of Germans, Italians. And this is a plate full of confusion of all kinds, especially when Fritz has problems with paying taxes, Cleitinho joins a band and Neni wants to become YouTuber. Aunt Nena will have to come up with strategies to resolve the situation in which Fritz involved the family, otherwise they could lose the house where they live. To make the situation even more difficult, Neni is bullied at school.
response.title: As aventuras de uma família da colônia
